dt: {bc}a garment for the upper part of the body: such as
{bc}a cloth garment usually having a collar, sleeves, a front opening, and a tail long enough to be tucked inside trousers or a skirt
{bc}all or a large part of one's money or resources

dt.t: lost his {wi}shirt{/wi} on that business deal

et: Middle English {it}shirte{/it}, from Old English {it}scyrte{/it}; akin to Old Norse {it}skyrta{/it} shirt, Old English {it}scort{/it} short
shortdef: a garment for the upper part of the body: such as
a cloth garment usually having a collar, sleeves, a front opening, and a tail long enough to be tucked inside trousers or a skirt

dt: {bc}something intended to stir up or revive partisan animosity
usually used in the phrase {it}wave the bloody shirt{/it}

shortdef: something intended to stir up or revive partisan animosity —usually used in the phrase wave the bloody shirt

dt: {bc}a woman's close-fitting top made with a sewn-in or snapped crotch

shortdef: a woman's close-fitting top made with a sewn-in or snapped crotch

dt: {bc}a usually loose-fitting cotton shirt with patch pockets

et: from its use in rough country
shortdef: a usually loose-fitting cotton shirt with patch pockets

dt: {bc}a usually short-sleeved shirt having a notched collar and often patch pockets

shortdef: a usually short-sleeved shirt having a notched collar and often patch pockets

dt: {bc}a man's shirt especially for wear with evening dress
{bc}a shirt suitable for wear with a necktie

shortdef: a man's shirt especially for wear with evening dress; broadly : a shirt suitable for wear with a necktie

dt: {bc}a shirt made of rough animal hair worn next to the skin as a penance
{bc}one that irritates like a hair shirt

shortdef: a shirt made of rough animal hair worn next to the skin as a penance
one that irritates like a hair shirt

dt: {bc}a usually short-sleeved sport shirt with a colorful pattern

shortdef: a usually short-sleeved sport shirt with a colorful pattern

dt.t: I loved a gray shawl collar sweater for $173, and a soft {wi}lumberjack shirt{/wi} in a muted brown and purple plaid, also for $173.

dt: {bc}one having a red and black {d_link|buffalo plaid|buffalo plaid} pattern

dt.t: This Field Camp Irish Setter vest is a modern twist on the classic red-and-black {wi}lumberjack shirt{/wi}.

shortdef: a plaid flannel or woolen shirt; especially : one having a red and black buffalo plaid pattern
